game.name: Runback
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Stats, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Runback is an indie platform fighter where your character is different every game. After each round upgrade your character and run it back! Play with up to 4 players locally or online.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Runback is an indie platform fighter where your character is different every game. After each round upgrade your character and run it back! Play with up to 4 players locally or online.
